website_summaries.verdict: Top choice for those who don't have a lot of outdoor space – or a lot of extra cash.
pros: Small set includes 1 love seat, 2 chairs and a coffee table
Great quality for a low price
Bright red color cushions – a welcome distinction from the beige patio sets that dominate the marketplace
cons: Cushions are on the thin side, but not uncomfortable to sit on

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this patio set! Assembly was easy since all the parts are labeled so well--even the right and left arms come in different color sleeves so you don't get confused. A winner!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Mama

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: My item came with a defect . The cushion within time I could see you feeling the frame eventually The assmbely wasn't so hard until the screws dont match up with the drilled holes . You can't return item to Walmart if you have an issue and the number give. Noone answers the phone .
customer_reviews.author: Doris Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Wait and See
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but we'll see how many seasons it will last. Perhaps got what we paid for, did not realize this was Walmart brand. Cushions are very thin, already (one month in) beginning to feel the frame. Love seat is not level (took apart & reassembled just to confirm it wasn't user error).
customer_reviews.author: fleur

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: The set is very nice, table teaders a little. Cushions are getting thread worn after a couple summers.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Starcevich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to assemble, clear instructions, comfortable, and reasonably-priced. would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a new sunroom where my cats stay most of the time. Comfortable to sit on, comfortable for the cats to lie on and cat hair cleans off it very easy. Great addition to my sunroom.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality fabric and material
customer_reviews.text: The color on these is bright and stunning. Very good quality fabric and material.
customer_reviews.author: MyTwoCents

customer_reviews.title: a tremendous bargain
customer_reviews.text: Unbeatable deal. Comfortable, stylish, sturdy, not too big nor too small. A half dozen compliments already.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to assemble. And look great, looks like you paid more than you actually did.
customer_reviews.author: Naji Pine

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This set is a little low to the ground but well made and easy to assemble. Looks great and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for small patios.
customer_reviews.text: Great for small patios, color is vivid. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value for the price we paid
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY what we expected in color and quality. GREAT value for the price we paid. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for something comfortable, aesthetically pleasing and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Started to fade after couple of months , but it was cheap and we had a place to sit outside . Will not last
customer_reviews.author: A E

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I wish the numbers on the instruction sheet were on the parts packages. And a tracking number for delivery would have been nice. Minor nuisances. Excellent otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Gmalala

customer_reviews.title: (No offense) Once together it really did look nice. Its a bright red
customer_reviews.text: At first while opening the package, I thought this was intended for midgets. (No offense) Once together it really did look nice. Its a bright red. Sturdy. Used for about a year now and it's still brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Costa

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful in person and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful in person and easy to assemble. Great quality and the price is perfect compared to the local retailers. Similar sets locally are going for $700 and up. And the fact that these come with cushions it’s a winner too. Cushions alone can run around $40 a piece easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together all parts were there a must for anyone that needs a nice seating for your patio or deck
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: So far has held up great with 7 kids bouncing all over them all summer long. Color has not faded at all! Very happy with quality for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, for the work to put it together ...
customer_reviews.text: Just okay, for the work to put it together - I would have paid more to have it delivered already put together. The bench is wobbly, the legs don't both rest on the ground. The cushions for your back on the bench only have one plastic connector piece, therefore they flop around if it is windy...Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful patio set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the small price. Easy assembly. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Harlan Rollenhagen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy exceptional price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and a splash of color for our patio. 6 months in and still awesome value for price paid
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: ... back and forth about purchasing and I am so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth about purchasing and I am so glad I did. It looks great on my apartment balcony. Can't beat the price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Y.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good set
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent set. The price is inline with the value.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed having this set
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed having this set. However, the cushions have faded badly and I can't find information about whether I can replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my new gazebo
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my new gazebo. Family and friends loved the color true to the description. Easy assembly and perfect for entertainment
customer_reviews.author: HEM

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty but looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Price matches with the quality. Not heavy duty but looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped quick and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this the week before super bowl. I was having a party at our house and wanted some seating for around our fire pit. I knew I was cutting it close on the shipping, but the seller was so prompt. They got my order shipped the next day and it arrived a few days before the party. Just enough time to get it all set up. It went together easy and it looked beautiful next to our fire pit. I received a lot of compliments. It is very comfortable and I have a feeling we will spend a lot of time outside enjoying it!.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice wasntpricey. The cushions are a bit thin. Perfect for the money with a big puppy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. A bit time consuming to assemble the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hammill

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful set. Easy to put together and looks and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set. Easy to put together and looks and feels great. I like the way it looks good on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the quality. Fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Terry Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: 4 piece set nice color. Doesn't look cheap
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. 4 piece set nice color. Doesn't look cheap. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great patio set.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new patio set. Very easy to put together, cushions are pretty decent size,not to thin like a few other sets I was checking out. Fits perfectly on my balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zippers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's fine for the price...until you want to wash the covers! All the zippers are pulled to the end and tucked inside so it takes 5 minutes to try to work each one out. Made a hole in one. Infuriating!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M S

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble. I would definitely recommend this set. I've had it for almost two years and it is still like new. Comfortable and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sassylatin

customer_reviews.title: but once assembled was sturdy and met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Surprising compact upon on arrival, but once assembled was sturdy and met expectations. Nice addition to three season porch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fitzgibbon

customer_reviews.title: love this and so does Miss Pearl
customer_reviews.text: love this and so does Miss Pearl, my black cat. Her shiny black coat makes her look gorgeous on in contract to the red!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Happy relaxing on my deck
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition, very comfortable & love the color. Very pleased. Would definitely recommend this to anyone, great price as well
customer_reviews.author: barbara ann bryant

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Not too difficult to assemble but not easy. So far so good on being sturdy and weatherproof. Numerous compliments so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Well make and durable combination. Perfect for outdoor 'living room!' I bought as a gift and my mom loves this wonderful, durable set. Holds up even in the hot FL sun!
customer_reviews.author: smileyface_girl

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: the set was very nice for the money,however the furniture was very small in comparison to others I have see.i suggest to check the size and also the return policy...
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Just finally put this set together today. Very easy to put together with minimal tools. Great looking set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: delina walsh

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put together and not as sturdy as I like but looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the set
customer_reviews.text: I like the set, but it did not come with the correct screw sets so it is just sitting on my patio in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Fulgencio

product_meta.title: Mainstays Stanton Cushioned 4-Piece Patio Conversation Set, Seats 4 (Red)
product_meta.description: Enhance your outdoor living space with the Mainstays Stanton Cushioned 4-Piece Patio Conversation Set. This set comes with two chairs, one loveseat and a coffee table. The table features a tempered glass top as well as rounded edges for a sleek and stylish touch. It features a durable, powder-coated dark brown steel frame and comfortable cushions with an easy on-and-off clip for added convenience. The fabric is weather resistant, extremely durable and simple to spot clean. This steel conversation set provides cool ventilated seating, allowing you to enjoy a cup of coffee with friends or when entertaining guests at your next party or gathering. Place it on your patio, deck, poolside or near your garden for an updated, refreshing look. Enjoy the comfort and style of Mainstays Stanton Cushioned 4-Piece Patio Conversation Set.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars95 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
